verse:
विशुद्धविज्ञानघनं स्वसंस्थया समाप्तसर्वार्थममोघवाञ्छितम् ।
स्वतेजसा नित्यनिवृत्तमाया गुणप्रवाहं भगवन्तमीमहि ॥

vedabase.translation: Let us approach You, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, for shelter. You are full of perfectly pure spiritual awareness and are always situated in Your original identity. Since Your will is never thwarted, You have already achieved all possible desirable things, and by the power of Your spiritual energy You remain eternally aloof from the flow of the qualities of illusion.

terms.समाप्तसर्वार्थममोघवाञ्छितम्: that fulfills all desires and wishes without fail,
terms.भगवन्तमीमहि: I meditate upon the Supreme Lord.

gpt.meaning: I meditate upon the Supreme Lord who possesses pure and profound knowledge, which can be attained through self establishment. This knowledge fulfills all desires and wishes without any failure. The Supreme Lord, through His own brilliance, constantly manifests and withdraws Maya (the illusion that veils the true nature of reality). I contemplate upon the Supreme Lord who is the eternal flow of qualities.
